amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that any rule intended to ensure the safety of natural gas or hazardous materials pipelines or prevent, mitigate, or reduce the impact of spills from such pipelines is not considered a "major rule" under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 114-230 to ensure that any rule intended to ensure the safety of natural g as or hazardous materials pipelines or prevent, mitigate, or reduce the impact of spills from such pipelines is not considered a "major rule" under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 244 (Roll no. 476).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 244 (Roll no. 476).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mrs. Capps.
